name: WTOCNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from WTOC News Savannah, Georgia within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Savannah, Georgia area from the WTOC 11 Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
